Hi there!

I am slowly migrating my work here. In the meantime, have you made friends with Batuk yet?

I have a list of recent projects and writings up. Rest soon to follow.

It has taken me a while in my life to begin to collate all my scattered blogs into one cohesive tapestry. But I learned from my wiser friends that a patchwork collage is just fine.
